message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $13000. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can't justify spending $13000 on it at this time. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $11000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm not willing to go as low as $11000. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $12500. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value it holds for you.
